text: Mbalmayo is a town in the Centre Region of Cameroon. In 2012, it had a population of 60,091 people. It is the main town (capital) of the Nyong-et- So'o Division. Mbalmayo is located on the banks of the Nyong River, between the cities of Ebolowa and Yaound√©. It is known as a farming center. Category:Populated places in Centre Region (Cameroon)
title: Mbalmayo
